Class Allosaur

All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface
public class Allosaur
extends Dinosaur
A class which inherits from and represents a type of Dinosaur available in the game

  • Field Summary

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void eatCarcass()
    This method increases an Allosaur instance's food level by 50 each time it eats a dead dinosaur

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      This method returns the current actions that an allosaur can perform at a given turn
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      actions - The allowed actions for an allosaur instance
      lastAction - The last action the allosaur performed
      map - The current map the allosaur exists on
      display - The display of the world the allosaur exists in. Depicts the terrain type and existing actors
      Returns:
      A collection of actions

    • eatCarcass

      public void eatCarcass()
      This method increases an Allosaur instance's food level by 50 each time it eats a dead dinosaur
